cleaned_text: Homeopathy Medicines for Detoxification of Body [Detoxification](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/detoxification) is a physiological and medical process of blood cleansing by removing impurities from the blood. It is a means of cleaning and nourishing the body from inside and it is done at least once a year. It includes one or more of the following: dieting, fasting, colon cleansing, removal of [dental fillings](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/dental-fillings), or cutting out specific foods from your [diet](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/healthy-diet). Benefits of Detoxifying Your Body - Gets rid of excess waste - Boosts your energy - Strengthens your immune system - Improves your respiration process - Reduces weight - Provides anti-aging benefits The majority of the detoxification of your body is carried out by these 4 systems; Digestive, Respiratory, Urinary, and Dermal. Any disturbance in these 4 systems results in the accumulation of toxins in your body and may cause serious medical illnesses. Homeopathic Medicine for Detoxification To detoxify you body with homeopathy treatment helps in maintaining the proper functioning and balance of the 4 systems. It is a gentle, natural, and one of the safest ways of removing toxins. Homeopathic remedies for treating detoxification are as follows: - Berberis Vulgaris: Homeopathic medicine for liver cleansing, gall bladder, and kidneys. It is best suited for people who face rapid change of symptoms, [pain](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/pain)all over the body, repeated diarrhea, and stone in the kidney. - Chelidonium tincture Reliable homeopathy medicine to detoxify liver and gall bladder. It supports the liver in removing toxins from your body due to the heavy usage of drugs and antibiotics. - Senega: It is an effective homeopathic detoxification remedy for people exposed to respiratory issues with allergies. - Nux Vomica: It acts as a detoxification remedy for intestine and liver stimulator. It is mostly used for symptoms linked with a sedentary lifestyle and excessive consumption of alcohol, drugs, caffeine, and tobacco. - Taraxacum Officinale: Homeopathic medicine for cleansing stomach used by people with digestion issues. - Fumaria Officinalis: This Homeopathic remedy detoxifies your body by purifying the blood, leading to enhanced functioning of the liver. - Uva Ursi: It is an effective urinary antiseptic that supports the functioning of kidneys and the reproductive system. - Saponaria: It is used for skin draining purposes. - Aloe: Best Homeopathic medicines used for detoxification of the rectum.
